name: Fourth Turning Ventures
slogan: Employing traditional and new financial strategies to generate alpha in the crypto market
description: Our product will be managing investors money to deliver alpha.

team.name: Alexander Beasant
team.bioHtml: I founded the incubator for new products and services at Deloitte Ventures. I moonlight as an investor in the blockchain and cryptocurrency ecosystem.

jobs.title: Crypto Hedge Fund/Quant trader
jobs.description: I am looking for a co-founder with expertise in the 'traditional' financial markets, specifically in a hedge fund and/or other investment vehicle. It is envisioned that the fund will apply a number of investment approaches to generate alpha from the emerging crypto asset space including venture investing, generalised mining and complex mathematical models to predict investment opportunities. I am looking for a co-founder from a quantitative background with a blend of mathematics and programming expertise who has built models in the past and can demonstrate how these would be applied to the crypto asset markets.
